casebody.data:
No. 1322. State v. Sims.

November Term, 1882.

January 27th, 1882. B. Johnson, Jr., for petitioner. Gantt, solicitor, contra. Per curiam,

Application to reduce bail, upon the affidavit of the prosecutrix, who was the wife of the prisoner.

Application refused, the facts stated in the original affidavit upon which the warrant was issued, not being denied.
